content:
I'm actually thinking of creating a series of abstract pieces that capture the essence of the impressionist style, but with my own twist. I've been experimenting with layering colors and textures to achieve a sense of depth and luminosity. The book I bought has some amazing close-up shots of the paintings, and I'm using those as reference points to study the brushstrokes and color choices.

I've also been thinking about incorporating some of the vintage posters into my artwork, maybe using them as a base or incorporating them into collages. I think the combination of old and new could create some really interesting pieces. What do you think?
